name: a c i d 1.2
description: acid by CSA & digital-art-revolution.berlin invites you to an exploration trip. analog audio and video recordings merge into a new experience of color and sound. the analog world transcends into the digital. there will be altogether 15 extracts of one master, which was created only with analog recordings, three drops of 5 single pieces each. every drop will have its own nuance. every piece in the series will be minted only once. for more info pls contact curator via twitter @AWahllos - thx.
